title: Possible to get unbanned for account sharing
body: I was wondering if it was possible to get unbanned for account sharing? How does it affect other players too ?

replies.body:
If account ownership cannot be determined, then Riot can't in good faith return an account. They're hardly going to return an account to someone who isn't the original owner, so if ownership can't be determined for whatever reason they can't return the account and it will remain banned.

If an account was banned for boosting, it should be pretty clear why that's not allowed.

If you can prove the original owner can I get unbanned after they stated that my account wont get unbanned and thats their final decision 
?

From what I understand from the tickets you posted previously the answer would be no. From what support said it sounds like the account was shared (and/or compromised) by multiple people, and that the original owner either could not be determined, or was not taking responsibility for actions taken on the account that they shared.
It was only 1 person and it was unintentionally shared is the answer still no ?
From the tickets you posted, 1 person seems unlikely. If you want someone to take another look, ticket support again and they'll review, but I'm betting the answer will still be no.
Alright ill try my best and hope for the best thanks for that and it was 1 person.
